Package org.appkit.registry

Various registries for easing the work with i18n-texts, colors, fonts and images

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Fonts.Style styles for usage with the fonts-registry
Images.ImageInterface Implement this to enable the use of Images for a custom-control.
 

Class Summary
Colors SWT Color cache/registry
Creates, assigns and caches Colors.
Fonts SWT Font cache/registry
Creates, assigns and caches Fonts.
Fonts.Bold default font, but bold
Fonts.HugeBold default font, but bold and height increased by 4
Fonts.Monospace monospace font, returns "Lucida Console" on Windows and "Monaco" on Mac.
Images SWT Image cache/registry
Creates, assigns and caches Images.
 

Package org.appkit.registry Description

Various registries for easing the work with i18n-texts, colors, fonts and images
